function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Imbalance in pandemic response indicators among different gbc&rss may result in limited options for residential buildings to address specific pandemic-related challenges.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of residential buildings as multifunctional spaces during pandemics and post-pandemics","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in importance of residential sustainability due to predicted increase in zoonotic diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of access to urban green spaces leading to overcrowding in existing spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination in urban policy and planning to address new behaviors and needs arising from the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases spread through outdoor activities and social interactions in urban parks during the pandemic.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher education and knowledge in urban planning may lead to overconfidence in understanding disease transmission dynamics in urban public parks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased demand for urban green spaces may lead to overcrowding and insufficient social distancing measures in parks.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ugs serving as centers of public gathering can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased importance of green spaces and ugs as places of refuge during the pandemic may lead to overcrowding and congestion in these areas, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on ugs for respite and isolation can lead to non-compliance with public health guidelines and riskier behavior in these areas.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced visitation to parks and urban green spaces due to legal restrictions on access","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dichotomy in access to green spaces resulting in localized or long-distance travel","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in use of private cars and increase in pedestrian traffic for reaching green spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduced accessibility to ugs due to pandemic restrictions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on mental health and well-being due to reduced access to ugs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on hygiene and sanitation in urban planning and management","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited education and awareness about public health and environmental hygiene","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Correlation of green areas with concepts such as ’awareness’, ’city’, ’greenery’, ’lack’, and ’urbanization’.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pca analysis linking ’green areas’, ’trees’, and ’citizens’ with ’nature’, ’man’, and ’to create’.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thematic analysis identifying concepts related to governance, awareness, and benefits and services in the context of green spaces.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Respondents missing spending time outdoors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relationship between visitation frequency and missing ugs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Word matrix analysis revealing common terms related to nature and urbanization","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Clear majority of respondents reported missing urban green spaces ugs during the period of closure, indicating a high pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in ugs visitation patterns during the pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceptions of ugs during home quarantine","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased travel to green areas outside residence","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Preference for urban parks and crowded areas for physical exercise","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in non-essential activities and social interactions in green areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Significant correlations between travel distance and place of residence","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differences in means of transportation to reach urban green spaces during the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in the type of green space visited during the pandemic containment period","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited use of outdoor spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in ugs visiting behavior during covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Traveling to ugs at varying distances","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Visiting urban parks and green countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contagious and infectious diseases spreading through close contact","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data cleaning and filtering leading to incorrect analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to identify statistical differences in disease prevalence between countries and regions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Language barrier in translation of responses might result
